isis.stitle: 3300 HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - Install - Hood

svcproc.title: Hood
svcproc.para: If required, assemble tilt assist support assemblies, splash panels and or insulator panels to the hood before installing hood.

step1.para: With an assistant, rest the hood assembly on a padded work stand.
Check the chassis cross bar for the alignment scribe line to locate hood hinge plate in its proper location.
Ensure that the hinge plate mounting bolts are in place on the chassis cross bar and that sufficient clearance is available to slide hinge plate in place.
With an assistant place the hood assembly on the chassis cross bar and align with hinge plate mounting bolts. Check hinge plate location reference to scribed line.
With hinge plate in aligned position, tighten hinge plate mounting bolts ( Figure 74, Item 2). Tighten the hinge plate mounting bolts to required torque value.
With hood secured to chassis, locate a padded stand and place in front of chassis to support tilted hood.
Tilt hood forward and rest on padded stand.

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. HINGE PIN SLEEVE BOLTS AND NUTS

step1.para: Locate torsion bars.

step2.para: Check torsion bars, smaller diameter torsion bar to be installed first.

step1.para: With smaller ( Figure 75, Item 9) diameter torsion bar shorter end, install in driver side torsion bar retainer bracket Figure 75, Item 7).
Install retainer clip on torsion bar end ( Figure 75, Item 8).

Lay torsion bar in torsion bar guide bracket ( Figure 28, Item 2) ( NOTE: Figure 33 given for reference only, this view is passenger side, driver side is reversed) on driver side and place opposite end of torsion bar in hood torsion bar retainer bracket ( Figure 75, Item 10). Hood may have to be slightly lifted to allow insertion of torsion bar in bracket.
Install retainer clip ( Figure 75, Item 11).

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. TORSION BAR UPPER MOUNTING BRACKET (PASSENGER SIDE)
5. FRAME RAIL TORSION BAR END BRACKET (PASSENGER SIDE)
7. FRAME RAIL TORSION BAR END BRACKET (DRIVER SIDE)
10. TORSION BAR UPPER MOUNTING BRACKET (DRIVER SIDE)

step1.para: Locate remaining torsion rod (12.5mm diameter).
Insert torsion rod end in passenger side frame torsion bar bracket ( Figure 28, Item 5).
Install retainer clip ( Figure 75, Item 4).
Place torsion bar over torsion bar guide and over previously installed torsion bar ( Figure 28, Item 2).
Insert torsion bar ( Figure 75, Item 9) end in driver side hood torsion bar bracket ( Figure 75, Item 10).
Install retainer clip ( Figure 91, Item 11).
Raise the hood to approximately a 45 degree angle and support it, to allow for reconnecting of the hood stop cables.
Place clevis ( Figure 24 , Item 2) of hood stop cable ( Figure 25, Item 2) assembly over radiator top frame clevis mounting bracket ( Figure 25, Item 4).
Insert clevis retainer pin ( Figure 25, Item 3).
Follow same procedure for opposite side cable stop assembly.
With hood tilted, locate harness connections.
Reconnect front end wire harness connectors. Secure the wire harness with the clips and loop clamps provided, as necessary.
The front grille / shroud assembly may be reinstalled at this time.
Close the hood and latch the hood on both sides.
The front bumper assembly may be reinstalled at this time.
